title: [Ruins, Stone Bridge]
description: This narrow stone bridge held aloft by iron-banded pillars offers a gently curving connection point between platforms, while thin rope railings span its entirety.  A carved circular platform rests below, partially submerged in the crystal blue water.

A narrow stone bridge held aloft by iron-banded pillars offers a connection point between platforms, while a thin rope stretches between one end of the bridge to the other.  A carved circular platform rests below, partially submerged in the water.
